newport-flight-boats.title: Newport Flight Boats
newport-flight-boats.description: A series capturing the serene beauty of boats in Newport harbor, exploring the relationship between human-made vessels and natural water environments.

ellington-bridge.title: Ellington Bridge
ellington-bridge.description: An architectural study of the Ellington Bridge, examining how urban infrastructure creates both connection and division in the cityscape.

ibiza.title: Ibiza
ibiza.description: Mediterranean landscapes that capture the essence of Ibiza beyond its commercial reputation, focusing on natural beauty and quiet moments.

formentera-net.title: Formentera Net
formentera-net.description: A close study of fishing nets in Formentera, exploring textures, patterns, and the tools of traditional maritime life.

la-romana.title: La Romana
la-romana.description: Dominican Republic street scenes and architectural details that reveal the character of La Romana through everyday moments.

mar-del-plata.title: Mar del Plata
mar-del-plata.description: A triptych documenting the coastal city of Mar del Plata, from its beaches to its urban architecture and local culture.

ny-laundromat.title: NY Laundromat
ny-laundromat.description: An intimate look at New York City laundromats as community spaces, exploring the intersection of necessity and social connection.

palermo-soho.title: Palermo Soho
palermo-soho.description: Street photography from Buenos Aires' trendy Palermo Soho neighborhood, capturing its artistic energy and urban character.

recoleta-cat.title: Recoleta Cat
recoleta-cat.description: A portrait of urban wildlife in Buenos Aires' historic Recoleta district, where cats navigate between past and present.

sarasota-tree.title: Sarasota Tree
sarasota-tree.description: A study of a single tree in Sarasota, Florida, examining how nature persists and adapts within developed landscapes.

piriapolis-dinner.title: Piriapolis Dinner
piriapolis-dinner.description: A dining scene from Uruguay's coastal town of Piri√°polis, exploring food culture and social gathering spaces.

almagro-casa-cultural.title: Almagro Casa Cultural
almagro-casa-cultural.description: Documentation of cultural spaces in Buenos Aires' Almagro neighborhood, where community and art intersect.
